level.heading: Nuisance.
level.text: Graffiti is a nuisance and the owner of the property on which the graffiti is located shall abate the graffiti or authorize the Mayor to abate the graffiti as provided for in § 42-3141.03.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 42-3141.05 and § 42-3141.11.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 3 of Anti-Graffiti Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-389, May 5, 2010, 57 DCR 4332).
